snippet: A federal judge on Friday said Arkansas must continue its Medicaid contract with Planned Parenthood while she considered a lawsuit challenging the state’s decision to end funding over secretly recorded videos by an anti-abortion group.
abstract: Federal Judge Kristine G Baker issues injunction stopping Arkansas from ending its Medicaid contract with Planned Parenthood while she considers lawsuit challenging state's decision to end funding based on videos that were secretly recorded by anti-abortion group.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday said Arkansas must continue its Medicaid contract with Planned Parenthood while she considered a lawsuit challenging the state’s decision to end funding over secretly recorded videos by an anti-abortion group.

headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Planned Parenthood Wins a Reprieve Over Medicaid Funding
headline.main: Arkansas: Planned Parenthood Wins a Reprieve Over Medicaid Funding
